title: Come Back
lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh-oh, oh-oh
Oh-oh, oh-oh-oh
[Verse 1]
Movin', again
Comfort of the chase
Now and again
This, my savin' grace
Dead on the inside, I've got nothing to prove
Keep me alive and give me something to lose
Goodbye, this time
Leavin' you
[Pre-Chorus]
I've been gone so long, so
Gone so long
[Chorus]
But I will come back, I will come back
I will come back, I will come back
I will come back, I will come back
I will come back, I will come back for you
[Interlude]
Oh-oh, oh-oh
Oh-oh, oh-oh-oh

[Verse 2]
Changes, changin'
Back and forth again
Tradin' places
Strangers in the end
Dead on the inside, I've got nothing to prove
Keep me alive and give me something to lose
Goodbye, this time
Leavin' you
[Pre-Chorus]
I've been gone so long, so
Gone so long
[Chorus]
But I will come back, I will come back
I will come back, I will come back
I will come back, I will come back
I will come back, I will come back for you!
For you
[Instrumental Break]
[Chorus]
I will come back, I will come back
I will come back, I will come back
I will come back, I will come back
I will come back, I will come back for you

[Outro]
I will come back
I will come back
I will come back
I will come back
I will come back
I will come back
